rows.label: bf06190100_0010
rows.name:
Say, chum. Which one d'you fancy,
Homura or Hikari?

rows.label: bf06190100_0020
rows.name:
Uh, Zeke...
You can't just ask someone...

rows.label: bf06190100_0030
rows.name:
Anyway, they're the same person! I've never
really thought of them separately...

rows.label: bf06190100_0040
rows.name:
You sure?
Their personalities are completely different.

rows.label: bf06190100_0050
rows.name: Like, Hikari is jolly intense.

rows.label: bf06190100_0060
rows.name:
And Homura is just totally quiet, or, I dunno...
lacks Hikari's pressure.

rows.label: bf06190100_0070
rows.name: On the outside, maybe.

rows.label: bf06190100_0080
rows.name:
But Homura's got a lot of backbone too.
She can be pretty stubborn!

rows.label: bf06190100_0090
rows.name: You seem to understand them pretty deeply.

rows.label: bf06190100_0100
rows.name: Well, I suppose you ARE their Driver.

rows.label: bf06190100_0110
rows.name: Hey...

rows.label: bf06190100_0120
rows.name: Yeah?

rows.label: bf06190100_0130
rows.name:
You're a prince from Luxuria,
aren't you, Zeke?

rows.label: bf06190100_0140
rows.name: Why were you in the Holy See?

rows.label: bf06190100_0150
rows.name: I mean, you can't just ask someone...

rows.label: bf06190100_0160
rows.name: Oh, his old man kicked him out!

rows.label: bf06190100_0170
rows.name: Oi, no! Bad Blade, bad!

rows.label: bf06190100_0180
rows.name: ...How long have you been standing there?

rows.label: bf06190100_0190
rows.name: From about..."which one d'you fancy".

rows.label: bf06190100_0200
rows.name:
"Which one d'you fa..."
That's the whole conversation!

rows.label: bf06190100_0210
rows.name:
As I was saying, my Prince got
disowned by his father.

rows.label: bf06190100_0220
rows.name:
He spent all his time traveling the world
for fun, instead of attending to his studies.

rows.label: bf06190100_0230
rows.name: Then byeee!

rows.label: bf06190100_0240
rows.name:
It wasn't for fun! I was learning all about,
uh, society and international relations!

rows.label: bf06190100_0250
rows.name: "International relations," that whatcha call it?

rows.label: bf06190100_0260
rows.name:
Oi, can it, you! What are you doing
anyway, dissing your own Driver?!

rows.label: bf06190100_0270
rows.name: Hahahah, you guys crack me up.

rows.label: bf06190100_0280
rows.name: We make good partners right?

rows.label: bf06190100_0290
rows.name:
Yep.
Anyway, he sounds tough. Zeke's dad, I mean.

rows.label: bf06190100_0300
rows.name: Luxuria is an isolationist society...

rows.label: bf06190100_0310
rows.name:
Crossing its borders without leave
is strictly forbidden.

rows.label: bf06190100_0320
rows.name: It's been that way for ages now.

rows.label: bf06190100_0330
rows.name: Oh, hmm...

rows.label: bf06190100_0340
rows.name: But you've seen how my Prince here is.

rows.label: bf06190100_0350
rows.name:
Couldn't stop himself leaving a few times,
so he got chewed out and disowned.

rows.label: bf06190100_0360
rows.name: Back when he was, fifteen or something?

rows.label: bf06190100_0370
rows.name: Yeah, something like that.

rows.label: bf06190100_0380
rows.name:
Then the Pope himself found him half-dead
on the ground one day, and took him in.

rows.label: bf06190100_0390
rows.name: He made up that "special envoy" stuff.

rows.label: bf06190100_0400
rows.name: And that's how you ended up in Acedia...

rows.label: bf06190100_0405
rows.name: It all makes sense now.

rows.label: bf06190100_0410
rows.name:
Oh, but wait...
Is it safe for you to go back to Luxuria, then?

rows.label: bf06190100_0420
rows.name:
This time we've got official business from
the Holy See! It'll be fine. Probably.

rows.label: bf06190100_0430
rows.name: Besides...

rows.label: bf06190100_0440
rows.name: Yeah?

rows.label: bf06190100_0450
rows.name:
Luxuria is too ignorant of the outside world.
It needs a wake-up call.

rows.label: bf06190100_0460
rows.name:
Sire! We have reached the designated coordinates.
Please.

rows.label: bf06190100_0470
rows.name: Right! Ready?

rows.label: bf06190100_0480
rows.name: You betcha!

rows.label: bf06190100_0490
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: bf06190100_0500
rows.name:
Shut up and sit down, chum.
This'll be great!
